author: ate
msg: Removing an unused dependency on the PortletContextManager.
This was more or less dead code (the driving Map portletApps is never filled) and I traced it back to a commit from Graig (r606023)
but I fail to see how this could have done anything good.
After removing this code, the TCK (2.0) still passes so I guess the mentioned problem has been fixed otherwise.

author: bentmann
msg: [MCOMPILER-63] Provide specific default value for "encoding" parameter
o Reverted default encoding to platform encoding (http://www.nabble.com/-POLL--Default-Value-for-File-Encoding-td16958386.html)

author: davsclaus
msg: - mail consumers will not under the covers change from smtp to pop3 protocol. End-users need to change their URI to state correct protocol
- added better debug logging of minemessages

author: hboutemy
msg: added aliases: cr = rc, ga = final = ""

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-771: Fixed ConcurrentModificationException in RequestAddCookies protocol interceptor
